title: Establishes failure to pay association fees and carrying charges as grounds for eviction and requiring attorneys' fees and late charges to be assessed
summary: Establishes failure to pay association fees and carrying charges as grounds for eviction and for requiring attorneys fees and late charges to be assessed when a tenant fails to make arrears payments.
lawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to establishing failure to pay association fees and carrying charges as grounds for eviction and requiring attorneys' fees and late charges to be assessed when a tenant fails to make arrears payments
